subject: Empanelment of Advertising Agencies with Regional Offices
text: HRd <4q RTHF qiferarrut (Tsr 4Rdev & (NTHr 4AqT4, #Ra TTGT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) TrT4J *43 v-5 [ 6, #iz7-10, Erql; # faqrllt 110 075 0 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 7H/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/ Advertisement/ 2024 Policy Circular No.4.33/ 2024 dated June, 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No NHAI/Raj/Vig/2024 (Comp. No. 238556)} Sub: Empanelment of Advertising Agencies with Regional Offices reg: Reference NHAI Circular No. 4.25/2019 dated 01.10.2019 2 Annexure J' as referred in para 6 (c) of the above referred Policy Circular regarding Model Offer Document for Empanelment of Advertising Agencies with Regional Offices stands replaced as per the enclosed RFP_ 3 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: Encl : As stated above cyl2h (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2 Library for hosting the circular on library site: 3 Web Admin for circulation: 4441 NHAL 10th Policy Copy
